message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. Could you do $10,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I believe the product is worth more than that, I could come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
